result.arabic_text: وَإِذۡ قَتَلۡتُمۡ نَفۡسٗا فَٱدَّٰرَٰءۡتُمۡ فِيهَاۖ وَٱللَّهُ مُخۡرِجٞ مَّا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡتُمُونَ
result.translation: 72.Israa-iil xayloy Nafsi (seehadaytu kinnuk) Qiddeeniih kay Qidim mariiy maral haak itta keemaarissen waqdi kassita, Yalli Qiddiime numih caagidiy Qcllisak Sugteeni Ayyaaqeleeh Aybulleele.
